info.title: Ready to Ride
info.description: An API to manage the Ready to Ride stable.

get.description: Returns all horses from the system that the user has access to.

post.description: Creates a new horse. Duplicates are allowed

get.description: Returns a horse based on a single ID, if the user has access to the horse

put.description: Updates a horse based on a single ID and the provided Data, if the user has access to the horse. Only provide the data you want to update

delete.description: deletes a single horse based on the ID supplied

get.description: Returns all horse races from the system.
Returns all horse colours from the system.
Returns all horse difficulty levels from the system.
Returns all riding lessons for one week. Deafult is the current week.

parameters.name: trainer
parameters.description: ID of trainer of riding lesson to fetch

parameters.name: horses
parameters.description: IDs of horses of riding lessons to fetch. Comma separated. Only works in combination with bookedLessons or getPossibleHorseCombinations.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Date from which riding lesson should be fetched. If no toDate is defined the system will return the lessons for one week.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Date to which riding lesson should be fetched. If no fromDate is defined the system will return the lessons for one week.

parameters.name: getPossibleHorseCombinations
parameters.description: Specifies whether the system should return training lessons with possible horse combinations. If set to true the system will only return unbooked lessons.

parameters.name: bookedLessons
parameters.description: Specifies whether the system should return booked or unbooked lessons. If set to false the system will only return unbooked lessons. If set to true the system will only return booked lessons. If not set the system will return all lessons.

post.description: Creates a single new riding lesson. Duplicates are allowed

401.description: please login to access this function.

post.description: Creates a single new riding lesson. Duplicates are allowed

401.description: please login to access this function.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of riding lesson to cancel

get.description: Returns a list of users with the trainer role. The access on other users is restricted.

post.description: Creates a new user. Duplicates are allowed. Three different schemas based on the user role.

put.description: Updates the authorized user based on the provided Data. Only provide the data you want to update

get.description: Returns a user based on a single ID, if the user has access to the user
Get all bookings from the user with the specified id.
Returns all user roles from the system.
Returns all trainer focuses from the system.
Returns all user proficiencies from the system.

post.description: Authenticate using the credentials of an existing user.

get.description: Returns all stable infos from the system that the user has access to.
Get all bookings from the arena with the specified name.
Returns all News from the system that are addressed to the user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximum number of results to return

post.description: Post a new news. Duplicates are allowed

text.example: Pferd das krass sein tut hat auf krassem Tunier gewonnen mit dem Trainer xyz.
